html:
Cash Invoice
فاتورة نقدية
Invoice No. {{doc.name}}
Page No
{{ _("Page {0} of {1}").format('', '') }}
Patient: {{ doc.patient }} File No: {{ frappe.db.get_value("Patient", doc.patient, "patient_number") }} Visit Date: {{ frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.creation).strftime("%d/%m/%Y %H:%M:%S",) }}
{% if doc.insurance_party and doc.insurance_party != "" %}
Payer Name Plan Patient Card No. Form No.
{{doc.insurance_party}} Class Default {{ doc.patient_card_no }} {{ doc.form_no }}
{% endif %} {% for item in doc.items %} {% endfor %}
Service Description Price Charge (Patient Share)
{{ item.item_code }} {{ item.rate + item.discount_amount }} {{ item.rate }}
Currency
User
Printing Date
Printed By 		: {{ doc.currency }}
: {{ doc.modified_by }}
: {{ frappe.utils.get_datetime().strftime("%d/%m/%Y %H:%M:%S",) }}
: {{ frappe.session.user }} 		Total:
{{ doc.total }}
Discounnt
Amount Paid 		: {{ doc.discount_amount }}
:{{'%0.2f'| format(doc.grand_total - doc.outstanding_amount|float)}}
Balance : {{ doc.outstanding_amount }}
This Invoice is considered Valid if it Carries the Official Number and Stamp
name: Sales Invoice
